title: ContentItem
description: Schema for image related information for (digitised paper) media content items in the Impresso project.

page_id_ss.description: List of page IDs associated with the content item.

page_nb_is.description: List of page numbers the content item appears on.

nb_pages_i.description: Total number of pages the content item is on.

front_b.description: Indicates if the CI is on the front page.

reading_order_i.description: Reading order index of the content item, for the issue table of content.

olr_b.description: Indicates if the original digitised document has optical layout recognition (OLR).

rc_plains.description: List of region coordinates in stringified JSON format.

lb_plain.description: Serialized JSON of line breaks (relative to textual content).

pb_plain.description: Serialized JSON of paragraph breaks (relative to textual content).

rb_plain.description: Serialized JSON of region breaks (relative to textual content).
